name: petite-vue-directives
description: A collection of custom directives for petite-vue.

scripts.git:init: git remote add gitee https://gitee.com/wavef/petite-vue-directives.git && git remote add github https://github.com/WaveF/petite-vue-directives.git && git push -u gitee master
scripts.git:push: git push --force gitee master && git push --force github master:main

author: wavef
